rueRatio.Name: ratio of clear sky LUE to max LUE
rueRatio.Comment: ratio of clear sky LUE to max LUE, in turner et al., appendix A, e_{g_cs} / e_{g_max}, should be between 0 and 1

devStage.comment: experimental: try-out, tested: runs and produces sane output, consolidated: tested and used for scientific purpose, published: for published approach
